title: Drawing, "The Aeneas Group from the Conflagration in the Borgo", ca. 1820
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and sepia wash over traces of graphite on off white laid paper
markings: Watermark: lily in double segment, under CB

Drawing, "The Aeneas Group from the Conflagration in the Borgo", ca. 1820.
ca. 1820. Pen and brown ink, brush and sepia wash over traces of graphite on off white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-695.
